mapper.select: select (DATE_FORMAT(b.fecha, "%M")) as mes, year(b.fecha) as anio, sum(b.total) as total, sum(db.cantidad) as productos, count(distinct(b.codUsuario)) as clientes, users.users as users from tb_boleta b join tb_detalle_boleta db on db.numBoleta = b.numBoleta, (select count(codUsuario) as users from tb_usuarios where idTipo = 0) as users where year(b.fecha) = #{anio} group by mes;

select p.idprod as idprod, p.nomprod as nombre, p.stock as stock, c.descripcion as categoria, sum(db.cantidad) as cantidad, sum(db.cantidad*db.preciovta) as total, p.estado as estado from tb_detalle_boleta db join tb_boleta b on db.numBoleta = b.numBoleta join tb_productos p on db.idprod = p.idprod join tb_categorias c on p.idcategoria = c.idcategoria where b.fecha between #{fech1} and #{fech2} group by p.nomprod;
